front.court:
HIGH COURT OF MANIPUR
AT IMPHAL
front.extra: , learned counsel for the petitioner and

learned Government Advocate for the respondents.
[2] Since no counter affidavit has been filed,

,learned
Government Advocate for the respondents seeks time for filing counter affidavit.
[3]

,learned Government Advocate for the respondents
further represented that a similar matter in WP(C) No.80 of 2021 is posted on
22.08.2022. Therefore, this matter may be posted along with WP(C) No. 80 of
2021 on 22.08.2022.
[4] Therefore, post this matter along with WP(C) No.80 of 2021 on
22.08.2022.
[5] Earlier interim order passed by this Court is extended till then.
Ab. Surjit
JUDGE
ABUJAM
